column5: The July edition of Ontario out of doors has an article on Ontario made lures and Mike's Handlebarz were one of them.  Now about that new for 2014 topwater...  Congratulations.
Congrats Mike.  You make a great product that produces.  Glad to see you're getting recognized

Thanks guys I was very excited when asked to be apart of the magazine. I am looking forward to having it hit the stores here.  As for the top water have have it out in limited numbers just doing a soft release on them.
Can I show pictures of them now Mike? Can I, can I, huh huh?????? LOL  Cheers, Ron...

I know another guy who would love to field test a top water... me! I've yet to catch a muskie on either a topwater or glide bait!  Seriously though - you make great lures Mike. Caught my best fish so far this season (44") on one of your twin tens.  Pete
Thanks Pete we try the field testing is over on the Tabtrum we are very happy with the way they run. Please email me pics any of your fish [emailÂ protected]  Yes Ron you can share the pics now

3 more muskies hooked, two landed on your blades yesterday Mike - no bigguns, but solid fish (36" and 37") Had a good day yesterday - went 5/6 overall, biggest was 41".  I'll send you the pic of the 44" from Saturday.
Awesome congrats on a great night Pere thanks for the pics
